channel.title: Distillation Methods on Qiongjie's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Distillation Methods on Qiongjie's Notes

item.title: BYOL: Bootstrap Your Own Latent
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Learn representations by predicting one network’s output from another’s, without using negative samples.

item.title: DINO: Self-Distillation with No Labels
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: A student network learns from a teacher network using self-distillation, producing emergent semantic attention maps.
